name: a never-ending trip back home
description:
Back then when I was a kid, every time my parents drive me home after a long day of vacation, I would always be half-asleep in the backseat. but for some reason I didn't want to fall asleep in the car, if I was sleepy I would try so hard not to fall asleep until I got home. Really miss those days, going on a long family trip, driving through the long and boring highway road, warm afternoon sun shines through the car window, trying to hold back my sleepy eyes while the faint sound from the car radio sounds like a lullaby… simpler times.

the 2nd piece from ‘never-ending’ animated gif series.
GIF 1080x1080, 215 frames, 12 fps.
2022
